title: Dr. Scott Cohen On Parenting, Childcare, Vaccines, & How To Combat Parental Anxiety & Depression
itunes:title: Dr. Scott Cohen On Parenting, Childcare, Vaccines, & How To Combat Parental Anxiety & Depression
description:
#305: On today's episode we are joined by Dr. Scott Cohen MD, FAAP. Dr. Cohen is a board certified pediatrician and the author of the bestselling parenting guide Eat, Sleep, Poop: A Common Sense Guide to Your Baby’s First Year. Today Dr. Scott joins us to discuss parenting, childcare, vaccines, and how to combat parental anxiety and depression.

Check out Dr. Cohen's Book HERE

To connect with Lauryn Evarts click HERE

To connect with Michael Bosstick click HERE

Read More on The Skinny Confidential HERE

For Detailed Show Notes visit TSCPODCAST.COM
